narrative.iWantTo: I test Getting Started Page of Ticket Master Developer's site

scenario.title: (/products-and-docs/apis/getting-started/) TKMDPA-874 Commerce API links in Available Resources table
scenario.step: When Commerce API menu has list of methods
Then all the Commerce API methods are shown on Getting Started page

scenario.title: (/products-and-docs/apis/getting-started/) Verification for general page's elements
scenario.step: Then check general page elements for Getting Started Page, where DISQUS = true and LeftMenu = true
